statements: SELECT * FROM Resources;
SELECT resource_name, resource_type FROM Resources WHERE resource_type = 'Database';
SELECT resource_id, resource_name FROM Resources ORDER BY resource_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Resources WHERE resource_type LIKE '%Tutorial%';
SELECT resource_name, resource_url FROM Resources WHERE resource_name LIKE '%SQL%' AND resource_type = 'Course';
SELECT * FROM Resources WHERE resource_type = 'Book';
SELECT resource_name, resource_type FROM Resources ORDER BY resource_name DESC;
SELECT resource_name, resource_type, resource_url FROM Resources WHERE resource_id > 100 ORDER BY resource_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM Resources WHERE resource_type = 'Video' AND resource_url LIKE '%youtube%';
SELECT resource_name, resource_url FROM Resources WHERE resource_type IN ('Article', 'Blog') ORDER BY resource_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Resources WHERE resource_type = 'reading';
SELECT resource_name, resource_type FROM Resources ORDER BY upload_date DESC;
SELECT user_name, email FROM Users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Resources WHERE upload_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT user_id, user_name, email FROM Users WHERE user_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM Resources WHERE resource_type='slide' ORDER BY upload_date DESC;
SELECT resource_name, resource_type FROM Resources WHERE upload_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY resource_name ASC;
SELECT user_name, email FROM Users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Resources WHERE resource_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT user_name, email FROM Users WHERE password = 'securepassword' ORDER BY user_name;
SELECT * FROM Resources;
SELECT resource_name, resource_type FROM Resources ORDER BY resource_name DESC;
SELECT slide_id, lecture_name, slide_number FROM LectureSlides WHERE slide_number > 10;
SELECT resource_id, resource_name, resource_type FROM Resources WHERE resource_type = 'Document';
SELECT video_title, video_duration FROM Videos WHERE video_duration > 60 ORDER BY video_duration ASC;
SELECT * FROM Resources WHERE resource_type = 'Book'
SELECT resource_name, resource_type FROM Resources ORDER BY resource_name ASC
SELECT resource_id, resource_name, LEFT(resource_link, 30) AS short_link FROM Resources WHERE resource_type = 'Article' ORDER BY resource_id DESC
SELECT slide_id, lecture_name, slide_number, slide_link FROM LectureSlides WHERE slide_number > 10 ORDER BY lecture_name ASC, slide_number DESC
SELECT video_title, video_duration FROM Videos WHERE video_duration > 30 ORDER BY video_title
SELECT * FROM Resources;
SELECT resource_name, resource_type FROM Resources WHERE resource_type = 'book';
SELECT slide_title, slide_url FROM LectureSlides ORDER BY slide_id DESC;
SELECT video_title, duration FROM Videos WHERE duration > 10;
SELECT material_title, material_url FROM ReadingMaterials WHERE material_type = 'article' ORDER BY material_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM Resources WHERE resource_type = 'book';
SELECT resource_name, resource_url FROM Resources ORDER BY resource_name DESC;
SELECT slide_id, slide_title, lecture_id FROM LectureSlides WHERE lecture_id = 1;
SELECT video_title, duration FROM Videos WHERE duration > 10 ORDER BY video_title;
SELECT * FROM ReadingMaterials WHERE material_type = 'research' ORDER BY material_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Resources;
SELECT resource_name, resource_type FROM Resources WHERE resource_type = 'Video';
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM Courses WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT material_title, material_url FROM ReadingMaterials ORDER BY material_title DESC;
SELECT lecture_title, lecture_date FROM Lectures WHERE lecture_date >= '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Resources WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT lecture_title, lecture_date FROM Lectures WHERE lecture_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT video_title, video_duration FROM Videos ORDER BY video_duration DESC;
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM Courses WHERE course_id = 2;
SELECT material_title, material_url, resource_type FROM ReadingMaterials JOIN Resources ON ReadingMaterials.resource_id = Resources.resource_id;
